name: Brian Fogg
description:
You are in a mind of a game designer trying to be productive in a distracting habitat of a game jam. Your ability to concentrate is continously reduced by different impulses attacking you from environment around you. The only way to get rid of them is to be faster and run away from them. Luckily, there are also stimulus that can help raise your attention levels. Which are which? You have to find by yourself.

Remember: YOU HAVE TO MOVE!!!   

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game was created as a submission for Bratislava Game Jam 2022 by team Uteráky. The theme of this jam was
"The Mist".

 Controls: WASD

 ♪ Francisco Alvear: Relax
